# Appendix 9: Spatial Data Processing for Future Pressures {#appendix-9 .unnumbered}

The future pressure indicators are currently undergoing revision, and new information will be available here in 2024 that reflects the updated approach to processing spatial habitat data. For a description of the approach used from 2016 - 2024, see [previous versions of this technical report (Version 11)](https://salmonwatersheds.ca/document_library_files/lib_475.pdf).
